texts.ru: Фотима проживает в районе Хуросон. Ей 49 лет. Она замужем. У нее пятеро детей. Ее сын находится в России. Сама она занимается животноводством. Она в основном разводит скот у себя дома. Разводит скот в дальнейшем для продажи. В этой области уже 20 лет. Кредит берет для закупа дойной коровы.
texts.en: Fotima lives in the Khuroson district.  She is 49 years old, married and has five children.  Her son is in Russia.  Fotima is involved in animal husbandry.  She primarily breeds livestock at home.  She breeds livestock for future sale.  Fotima has been involved in this business for twenty years.  She is requesting this loan for the purchase of a dairy cow.

loans.use: to purchase a dairy cow

loans.name: Mkwalia Group

texts.en:
Hadija, who is in her mid-20s, is married with three children. Two of them go to school.  She has had a business of being a food vendor for one year now.  She works from 9 a.m. to 5 p.m. daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be her first loan from Tujijenge Tanzania, which she wants to use for buying rice, baking flour, and cooking oil.  Her dream is to one day buy land. 

She will use this loan with her loan group "Mkwalia" which has a total of 21 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: To buy rice, baking flour, and cooking oil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a cooler and a heating cabinet.

loans.name: Bwizi Fraternity Group

texts.en:
Lawrence is 42 years of age and a married father of eight children in Kyenjojo district. He owns a retail shop which is located at the side of the road in a busy trading centre in Kyenjojo. He sells goods such as sugar, maize flour, salt, and soft drinks.

Lawrence is described as a very hardworking businessman who has managed to sustain his business over a long period of time. His retail shop generates about 50,000 Uganda shillings as profits per week. He says the long time he has spent in his business is due to his good customer care, hard work and determination.

With his Kiva loan, Lawrence plans to buy more retail goods like rice, soft drinks, maize flour, beans and salt to resell at his shop.

loans.use: to buy more retail goods like rice, soft drinks, maize flour, beans and salt.

loans.name: Divino Niño Jesus Group

texts.es:
Divino Niño Jesús se denomina el grupo de mujeres conformado en la ciudad de Itá, gracias a que la actual Directora contactó con la asesora  para informarse de la forma de trabajo que tiene el Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras, una vez asesorada acerca del Programa logró juntar a 15 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto en el octavo ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa.
La señora Dina se dedica a la venta de prendas, por medio de este trabajo ha logrado salir adelante y sustentar a su familia. Comenta que siempre tiene clientes que le solicitan las prendas que vende. Una de sus metas es tener su propio local donde pueda exhibir las prendas que tiene y de esa forma atraer a más clientes. Ella se considera una mujer emprendedora, luchadora y muy responsable.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de prendas de invierno, para que de esa forma pueda cumplir con los pedidos de sus clientes. Está agradecida con la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le brinda.
texts.en:
"Divino Niño Jesús" is the name of this communal bank.  This group of women was formed in the city of Ita, thanks to the current director, who contacted a loan officer to find out about how the Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras works.  Once informed about the program, she managed to gather together 15 women who are now working together very well in their 8th loan cycle; this group has been working in the program with great solidarity and cooperation.

Dina has a business selling garments, and through this work she has been able to get ahead and support her family.  She comments that she always has customers who request the items that she sells.  One of her goals is to have her own store where she could display the garments that she has, and in this way attract more customers.  She is considered to be an enterprising woman who is tenacious and very responsible.

Dina requests a loan to buy winter clothing, so that in this way she can fill her customer's orders.  She is grateful to the Fundación for providing her with this opportunity.

loans.use: to buy winter clothing to later sell

loans.name: Security Group

texts.en:
Mainda, who is in her mid 30s, is married with three children who go to school. She takes care of her mother as well. She has been running a general store for four years now. She works from 8 a.m to 9 p.m. daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be her 4th loan from Tujijenge Tanzania.  She used the previous loans to run and expand her general store and bought a Bajaji house expenses. She has paid back all of her loans successfully.  She wants a loan to start another business of selling tea masala (containing ingredients cardamon, cinnamon, gider and tea). Her dream is to one day be able to build her own house.

She will share this loan with her loan group "Security" which has a total of 15 members who will hold each other accountable for paying back their loans.

loans.use: To sell tea masala (containing ingredients cardamon, cinnamon, gider and tea).

payments.comment: Over-reported by partner.  Reduced to local price.

loans.name: Matluba

texts.ru: Матлуба жительница города Кургантюбе. Ей 53 года. Она замужем. У нее двое детей. Матлуба имеет среднее образование. Она более тринадцати лет занимается торговлей на рынке. В основном она продает лепешки (хлеб). Кредит берет для покупки лепешек (хлеба) и кульчи, чтобы увеличить ассортимент своего товара.
texts.en: Matluba lives in the Qurgan-Tube.  She is 53 years old, married and has two children.  Matluba has a secondary education.  She has been involved in sales at a market for over thirty years.  She primarily sells flatbread.  She is requesting this loan for the purchase of flatbread and cakes, in order to expand the assortment of her products.

loans.use: to purchase flatbread and cakes

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more foods like maize, beans and Irish potatoes to re-sell.

loans.name: Pablo

texts.es:
El señor Pablo tiene 59 años de edad, está casado con la señora Tomasa de 47 años de edad, tienen 3 hijas las cuales viven con ellos.
El señor Pablo se dedica a la venta de agujas para máquinas de coser, posee una clientela formada de hace años, surte a costureros y confeccionistas de la ciudad de Itá, Itauguá y alrededores, realiza esta actividad hace más de 23 años, gracias a este trabajo logró mantener y sacar adelante su familia y ayudar a sus hijos a estudiar. El señor Pablo trabaja de lunes a viernes  movilizándose a pie y en colectivo
El cliente solicita el préstamo para compra de agujas de diferentes medidas ya que tiene un gran pedido y no desea fallarle a sus clientes.
Cabe destacar que el señor Pablo es una persona muy sacrificada y trabajadora, es cliente antiguo y excelente de la Fundación Paraguaya.
texts.en:
Pablo is 59 years old, and is married to Tomasa, 47.  They have 3 children who live with them.  Pablo has a business selling sewing machine needles.  He has an established customer base that was formed years ago.  He is a supplier to the dressmakers and tailors in the cities of  Itá and Itauguá, and the surrounding areas.  He has been in this line of work for more than 23 years.  Thanks to this work he is able to get ahead and support his family, and help his children get an education.  Pablo works Monday through Friday, and he gets around on foot and on colectivos (vans that provide public transportation services.) 

Pablo requests a loan to buy needles of different sizes, since he has a big order and doesn't want to disappoint his customers.  It is worth mentioning that Pablo is a very hardworking and selfless person.  He is a longstanding and excellent client of Fundación Paraguaya.

loans.use: to buy sewing machine needles to later sell

loans.name: Balkhumor

texts.ru: Балхумор проживает в районе Хуросон. Возраст, 48 лет. Замужем. У нее 8 детей. Ее дети работают в Российской Федерации. Сама Балхумор у себя дома открыла магазин. У нее магазин со смешанным ассортиментом. В этой области она работает пять лет. Кредит берт для покупки холодильника.
texts.en: Balkhumor lives in the Khuroson district.  She is 48 years old, married and has eight children.  Her children work in the Russian Federation.  Balkhumor opened a store at home.  Her store has miscellaneous merchandise.  She has been involved in this field for five years.  She is requesting this loan for the purchase of a refrigerator.

loans.use: to purchase a refrigerator

loans.name: Hanifa

texts.en:
Hanifa   lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is married with two children and both go to school. She has no additional family members. She sells hardware retail from a rented shop. She been in business for the last seven years. She works seven days a week. 

Hanifa has requested a loan of 500,000 from MCDT SACCO to buy cement, nails, locks, and iron sheets. Her inspirational goal is to expand into a wholesale hardware shop. Her major business challenges include transportation and ever increasing prices of building materials. She lives in a rented house and her family has access to piped water and electricity. Her monthly expenses include rent and food.

loans.use: To buy more bags of cement, nails, locks and iron sheets.

loans.name: Salamatu

texts.en:
This is 25-year-old Salamatu.  She is married and has one child aged five years. In 2004, Salamatu established her cloth business. Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about Le 900,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of Le 4,000,000. 

Salamatu has already received and successfully repaid one loan, and now requires a new loan in order to buy lace, real wax cotton and local cotton. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately Le 300,000. 

In the future, Salamatu plans to further her education in nursing and buy a piece of land. She gets her goods from Guinea and Freetown.  She travels once per month by public transport to buy her business stock. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To pay for lace - 4 rolls @ Le 150,000, real wax cotton - 1 bale @ Le 2,200,000 and local cotton - 20 pieces @ Le 40,000.

loans.name: Terimbere Munyarwandakazi B Group

texts.fr:
Thérèse  fait partie du groupe Terimbere Munyarwandakazi. Elle est née au Rwanda et a 32 ans. Elle est mariée et elle a 4 enfants de 6 à 11 ans, dont 2 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 6 ans de primaire. 

Thérèse est agricultrice. C’est son deuxième  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit pour acheter 2 kg fertilisants et pour payer la main d’œuvre.  

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d‘augmenter l’agriculture en achetant les champs. Dans les prochaines années, Thérèse voudrait devenir une grande agricultrice dans son secteur. Avec les profits, elle prévoit de bâtir une autre maison d’habitation pour sa famille et payer les frais d’études universitaires pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Therese belongs to the Terimbere Munyarwandakazi group. She was born in Rwanda and is 32 years old. She is married and has four children between the ages of six and eleven, two of whom attend school. She was schooled up to the sixth grade of primary school.

Therese is a farmer. This is her second loan cycle with ACB. She will use her loan to purchase two kilos of fertilizer and to pay the workforce.

Her strategy for the growth of her business is to expand farming by purchasing fields. In the coming years, Therese would like to become a major farmer in her area. With her profit, she is planning on building another house for her family to live in and to pay for her children's college expenses.

loans.use: to buy two kilos fertilizer and to pay the workforce.

loans.name: Abner

texts.en:
Abner is 29 years old, married to Lydia and not yet blessed with children.

He runs three business at a go: a barber shop, a video library, and a chemist's in Kasarani Nairobi Kenya. He has been in these businesses for the last two years and gets an income of KES 15,000 per month.

He is applying for his second loan of KES 35,000 from KADET LTD which he plans to use to purchase more stock or equipment for his businesses like medicine and syringes (chemist's), CDs and DVDs ( video shop), and shaving machines (barber shop). He will use the extra profit to expand his business ventures, maybe buying a "bodaboda" motor bike for himself to try the transportation business.

he hopes to buy a plot of land and build a residential house. He is very hardworking.

loans.use: To purchase more stock or equipment such as medicine and syringes (chemist's), CDs and DVDs (video shop), and shaving machines (barber shop).

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose has a beauty salon. She has been in this business for five years working 7 days out of every week. Rose sells retail products in her shop. She also generates additional income by outside catering. The main business challenges for Rose include transportation and electricity. Her goal is to own a bridal salon. 

Rose lives in Uganda. She is married and has eight children, all of whom are in school. Rose lives in a home that she owns; she has access to electricity and piped water. Her major monthly expenses include school fees and feeding the family.

Rose has requested a loan of 1,000,000 Ugandan shillings from MCDT SACCO, which she will use to buy more boxes of cream relaxers, braids and weaves.

loans.use: to buy more boxes of cream relaxers, weaves and braids

loans.name: Marisol

texts.es:
Marisol nació en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 30 años de edad. Ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene un hijo. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. Ella se dedica a la venta de chicharrones de pollo y su puesto de venta está ubicado frente a su casa ósea en la calle. Ella sale a vender a las 6 de la tarde y se recoge a las 9 de la noche. Ya son seis meses que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien gracias al esfuerzo que pone en su trabajo. Ella también tiene una pequeña tienda de abarrotes en su domicilio donde vende productos de primera necesidad. El crédito que requiere Marisol es para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo bolsas de arroz, bolsas de azúcar y pollo. 

El Banco Comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Marisol was born in the city of Urubamba (Cusco, Peru). She is 30 years old. She has a common-law husband, with whom she has one child. She currently lives in the same city where she was born, and she also carries out her economic activities there. She works selling fried pieces of chicken, and her sales stand is located on the street in front of her house. She goes out to sell at 5 in the evening, and she packs up at 9 at night. She has operated this business for six months already, and it is going very well for her, thanks to the effort she puts into her work. She also has a small grocery store in her home, where she sells basic necessities. The loan which Marisol needs is to buy merchandse such as bags of rice, bags of sugar, and chicken.  

The communal bank “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” ["Lord of the Miracles of Urubamba"] meets every thirty days in the city of Urubamba (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known as an area with a lot of tourism and business; it is also well-known for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi, and because one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu, is found here.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as bags of rice, bags of sugar, and chicken.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase more beans, maize, coffee and millet to resell

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Maria; ella tiene 54 años de edad y es casada y tiene 6 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras y también se dedica al negocio de crianza de animales como gallinas, chanchos y cuyes, la socia vende las verduras en el mercado y también lleva animales los fines de semana al distrito de Chinchero, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de animales y también ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras y también para comprar gallinas, chanchos y cuyes al por mayor y también para comprar semillas de espinaca y fertilizantes para las tierras de cultivo.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “Virgin Natividad” communal bank located in the district of Urubamba, in the province of Urubamba in the department of Cusco.

The member is Maria. She is 54 years old, married and has 6 children. She alternates her daily activities with the business of selling vegetables and she also has a business of raising animals such as chickens, pigs and guinea pigs. She sells the vegetables in the market and also brings her animals to the district of Chinchero on the weekends. She wishes to expand and improve her animal business and also expand her vegetable-selling business. She is requesting the loan to buy vegetables and also to buy chickens, pigs and guinea pigs whole sale as well as to buy spinach seeds and fertilizers for her fields.

She is happy for the loan and promises to make her installment payments.

loans.use: to buy vegetables and also to buy chickens, pigs and guinea pigs whole sale as well as to buy spinach seeds and fertilizers for her fields.

loans.name: Hermitaña

texts.es:
Hermitaña nació en la ciudad de Yanahuara de la provincia de Urubamba (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 25 años de edad. Ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. Ella se dedica a la venta de mazamorra morada y arroz con leche de forma ambulatoria ósea en la calle, ella ofrece sus productos a los transeúntes. Ella también trabaja en la municipalidad de Urubamba en el área de limpieza de parques y jardines. El crédito que requiere Hermitaña es para comprar insumos como por ejemplo bolsas de arroz, bolsas de azúcar y sobres de mazamorra morada. 

El Banco Comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Urubamba (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Hermitaña was born in the city of Yanahuara in the province of Urubamba (Cusco, Peru) and is 25 years old. She has a common-law partner with which she has two children. Currently, she lives in the same city where she was born and where she has her business. She sells purple mazamorra (traditional maize-based pudding) and rice pudding in the street. She offers her food to passersby. She also works in the municipality of Urubamba cleaning parks and gardens. The loan that Hermitaña requires is to buy supplies such as sacks of rice and sugar as well as envelopes of purple mazamorra. 

The “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” Communal Bank meets every 30th in the city of Urubamba (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being a very touristic, commercial zone and for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi as well as because it is one of the seven wonders of the Machu Picchu world.

loans.use: to buy supplies such as sacks of rice and sugar as well as envelopes of purple mazamorra.

loans.name: Soledad

texts.es:
Soledad nació en la ciudad de Abancay del departamento de Andahuaylas (Perú) y tiene 23 años de edad. Ella es soltera y todavía no tiene hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco y donde realiza sus actividades económicas. Ella se dedica a la venta de granos secos como por ejemplo maíz, cebada, trigo y otros más. Ella lleva sus productos a vender  a los revendedores de la ciudad de Abancay. El crédito que requiere Soledad es para comprar mercadería  como por ejemplo  trigo, cebada y kiwicha. 

El Banco Comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Urubamba (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Soledad was born in the city of Abancay in the department of Andahuaylas (Peru) and is 23 years old. She is single and does not have any children yet. Currently, she lives in the city of Urubamba in the department of Cusco where she has her business. She sells grains such as corn, barley, wheat and others. She brings her products to sell to the retailers in the city of Abancay. The loan that Soledad requires is to buy merchandise such as wheat, barley and kiwicha (Amaranthus caudatus).

The “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” Communal Bank meets every 30th in the city of Urubamba (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known for being a very touristic, commercial zone and for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi as well as because it is one of the seven wonders of the Machu Picchu world.

loans.use: to buy merchandise such as wheat, barley and kiwicha (Amaranthus caudatus).

loans.name: Juan

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba y departamento de Cusco.

El socio es el Sr. Juan; el tiene 42 años de edad y es casado y tiene 4 hijos; El socio alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de maíz, ella se dedica a la agricultura, el siembra maíz y luego lo vende al por mayor a en el mercado de Urubamba, por medio de este negocio el socio saca adelante a sus hijos, el socio quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de maíz. El  socio solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz al por mayor. 
                                           
El socio está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the communal bank “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”. The communal bank is in the district of Urubamba, in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco. 

The member, Mr Juan, is 42 years old. He is married and has 4 children. The member alternates his daily activities with the business of selling corn.

His wife works in agriculture. He sows corn and then sells it in bulk in the Urubamba market. With this business, he is able to give his children a better life. The member wants to expand and improve his corn-selling business. The member is asking for a loan to buy corn in bulk. 

The member is happy with the loan and agrees to the repayments of his loan on time.

loans.use: to buy corn in bulk.

loans.name: Wilma

texts.es:
Wilma nació en la ciudad de Urubamba del departamento de Cusco (Perú) y tiene 33 años de edad. Ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad de Quillabamba del departamento del Cusco y donde realiza sus actividades. Ella es profesora y trabaja en el colegio Simón Bolívar de la ciudad de Quillabamba. Ella regresa a la ciudad de Urubamba  una vez al mes para ver sus familiares y para ver cómo va el negocio. Ella y su mamá tienen una pequeña cevicheria en la ciudad de Urubamba y quien administra el negocio es la mamá. El crédito que requiere Wilma es para comprar insumos como por ejemplo limones, pescado y otros insumos. 

El Banco Comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Urubamba (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Wilma was born in the city of Urubamba in the department of Cusco in Peru and is 33 years old. She lives with her partner and their two children in the city of Quillabamba, located in the department of Cusco. She works in Quillabamba as a school teacher at Simón Bolívar college. Wilma goes back to Urubamba once a month to see her family and check how her business is going. She and her mother have a small ceviche store in Urubamba which her mother manages. The loan that Wilma is applying for will go towards purchasing supplies such as lemons, fish and other ingredients.

The community bank “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” (Lord of Miracles of Urubamba) meet every month in the city of Urubamba in Cusco, Peru. Cusco is known for being a very commercialised touristy city because of its traditional festival, Inti Raymi, and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to purchase supplies such as lemons, fish and other ingredients

loans.name: María

texts.es: María es socia del Banco Comunal Llapanchik, en sus casa tiene una tienda de repuestos para carros y ahora invertirá en la compra de mas repuesto para poder hacer crecer su negocio, antes tenia pocos repuestos, desde que esta en FINCA Peru su tienda es un poco mas grande, ella siente que su vida ha cambiado, antes sufría por que no se llevaba bien con su esposo pero ahora la relación esta mejor, las capacitaciones en su Banco Comunal le han ayudado en los valores, lo que mas le gusta es el ahorro, tambien aprendió como tratar  a los clientes y como invertir mejor en su negocio.
texts.en:
Maria is a member of the Llapanchik Community Bank. She runs a spare car tyre store from her home and plans to purchase more spare tyres so her business can grow. Previously she had very few spare tyres, but since she has joined FINCA Peru her store has grown a little bigger. 

Maria feels as if her life has changed. Before, she used to suffer because she didn't get along with her husband, but now her relationship has improved. The training sessions run by the Community Bank have helped to re-evaluate her values. Now what she likes most is to save, and she has also learnt how to attend customers and better invest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase more spare tyres

loans.name: Avelina

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Avelina; ella tiene 40 años de edad y es conviviente y tiene 4 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras como zapallos, zanahorias, tomates, pasto y maiz, ella vende en las diferente ferias que existe en los diferentes distritos como Calca, Anta y Chinchero, ella vende en forma ambulatoria, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar el negocio de venta de verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras como zapallos, zanahorias, tomates y pastos al por mayor. 

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Avelina belongs to the ´Virgen Natividad´ (Christmas Virgen) community bank. It is located in the Urubamba district, which forms part of the province of Urubamba in the Cusco department.

Avelina is 40 years old and lives with her partner and her four children. She alternates her daily activities with her work as a street vendor selling vegetables such as pumpkin, carrots, tomatoes, herbs and corn in different fairs across a range of districts including Calca, Anta and Chinchero. Through this work Avelina is able to bring up her children. She would like to expand her business, so she is applying for a loan to purchase vegetables such as pumpkin, carrots, tomatoes and herbs in bulk. 

Avelina is happy to be receiving this loan and promises to make all her repayments on time.

loans.use: to purchase vegetables such as pumpkin, carrots, tomatoes and herbs in bulk.

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.es:
Beatriz nació en la ciudad de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 29 años de edad. Ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la misma ciudad donde nació y donde realiza sus actividades. Ella vende golosinas en el centro educativo “Nueva I” desde hace un año y le va muy bien. El crédito que requiere Beatriz es para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo galletas, chicles, caramelos y otras cosas más. 

El Banco Comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Urubamba (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Beatriz was born in the city of Urubamba in the department of Cusco in Peru and is 29 years old. She lives with her partner and their two children in the same city where she was born. She has worked in this city selling lollies in the educational centre “Nueva I” for one year and it is going very well. The loan that Beatriz is applying for will be used to purchase products such as biscuits, gum and lollies, amongst others. 

The community bank “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” (Lord of Miracles of Urubamba) meet every month in the city of Urubamba in Cusco, Peru. Cusco is known for being a very touristy and commercial city because of its traditional festival, Inti Raymi, and because it is home to one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to purchase products such as biscuits, gum and lollies, amongst others

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.es: Dionisia e socia del Banco Comunal Llapanchik, ella vende desayunos en una carreta y su esposo vende también desayunos en otro punto, ella esta en Finca hace 10 años y empezó con una carreta simple, ahora el préstamo que tendrá  será para poder invertir en su negocio, ella se siente muy bien en Finca, gracias al apoyo que le han dado Dionisia pudo mejorar su calidad de vida, con mucho esfuerzo se compró un carro y su terreno. Lo que mas le gusta son las capacitaciones aprendió como ahorrar, la puntualidad y como invertir  en su negocio.
texts.en:
Dionisia is a member of the Llapanchik community bank. She sells breakfasts from a cart and her husband also sells breakfasts from another spot. Dionisia has been with Finca for ten years. She began her business with a simple cart and now her loan will be used to re-invest in her business. 

Dionisia is very happy with Finca. Thanks to their support she has been able to improve her quality of life, and after a lot of effort she has managed to buy herself a car and some land. What Dionisia likes best about Finca are their training workshops which have taught her how to save, the importance of punctuality and how to invest in her business.

loans.use: to purchase products for her business

loans.name: Mujeres Virtuosas Group

texts.es:
El Comité de Mujeres de nombre Mujeres Virtuosas, se conformó en el año 2008, gracias a que la Directora General la Señora Petrona se informó del Programa gracias a la presidenta de otro grupo que era su vecina y la misma la invitó a formar su propio grupo, la misma contacto con la asesora informándose del programa Comité de Mujeres Emprendedoras y de su forma de trabajo. Y luego logró juntar a 16 mujeres quienes se encuentran trabajando muy a gusto ya se el 9no. ciclo, en forma conjunta y solidaria dentro del programa.
La señora Isabel se dedica a la venta de alimentos, gracias al buen sazón que tiene ha logrado formar una clienteal bien definida. Comenta que este trabajo le genera muy buenos ingresos y gracias a esto puede paliar los gastos que día a día surgen en la casa. Una de sus metas es poder abrir un local de venta de comestibles, donde pueda deleitar a las personas con sus platillos.
Ella solicita el crédito para la compra de carne, pollo, verduras y otros, insumos necesarios para la elaboracion de los alimentos que vende.
texts.en:
This women's committee called "Mujeres Virtuosas" ("Virtuous Women") was formed in 2008, thanks to the Director General, Señora Petrona.  She found out about the Program thanks to the president of another group, who was her neighbor.  This neighbor invited her to form her own group.  She contacted the adviser to learn about the Program "Committee of Entrepreneurial Women", and how it works.  She then succeeded in bringing together 16 women who very much enjoy working.  They are in their ninth lending cycle, and are in the program in full unity and togetherness.

Señora Isabel works selling food; thanks to the good taste of her food, she has been able to gain a solid customer base.  She comments that this work earns her a very good income, and thanks to this, she is able to cover the expenses that arise at home on a daily basis.  One of her goals is to be able to open premises to sell food, where she can delight people with her dishes.

She is requesting the loan for the purchase of meat, chicken, vegetables and other things; necessary ingredients for preparing the food she sells.

loans.use: to buy meat, chicken, vegetables, and other things to make food dishes.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es: Cirila es socia del Banco Comunal Llapanchik, es feriante, trae cereales y los vende en diferentes mercados, tiene 2 hijos, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá para ir a la chacra y poder comprar mas insumos para poder vender en las ferias, ella siempre fue feriante pero ahora con Finca lo hace con mas capital, gracias a Finca ella pudo tener una mejor calidad de vida para ella y para sus hijos, lo que mas le gusta de las reuniones de su Banco Comunal es el ahorro, gracias a las capacitaciones ella  pudo aprender a ser mas responsable y puntual, ahora su meta es poder tener una bodega y trabajará y ahorrará para ello.
texts.en: Cirila is a member of the communal bank Banco Communal Llapanchik. She is a stall-holder at different open-air markets where she sells grains. She has 2 children. She plans to use the loan she is asking for to go to a small farm to buy more supplies to sell at the markets. She has always been a stall-holder but now with Finca's help she does so with greater financial backing. Thanks to Finca she has been able to provide a better quality of life for both herself and her children. What she enjoys the most about the Banco Communal meetings is saving money. Thanks to the training she has learnt to be more responsible and punctual. Her goal now is to have a small grocery store. She will work and save for it.

loans.use: to buy grains.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.es:
Elizabeth nació en la ciudad de Urubamba del departamento del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 20 años de edad. Ella es soltera y no tiene hijos por el momento. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad del Cusco y donde realiza sus actividades. Ella trabaja en una tienda de venta de cortinas. Ella también se dedica a la crianza de animales menores como por ejemplo cuyes.  Elizabeth requiere el crédito para comprar más cuyes. 

El Banco Comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Urubamba (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Elizabeth was born in the city of Urubamba, in the department of Cusco (in Peru), and she is 20 years old.  She is single and for now has no children.

Currently she lives in the city of Cusco, and this is where she works.  She works in a store selling draperies.  She also works raising small animals, such as guinea pigs, for example.  Elizabeth is asking for the loan to buy more guinea pigs.

The Communal Bank "Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba" meets monthly in the city of Urubamba (in Cusco, Peru).  Cusco is well known for being a tourist and business area, for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi, and because it is the location of Machu Picchu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to buy more guinea pigs.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy more cattle to resell.

loans.name: Niceforo

texts.es:
Niceforo nació en la comunidad de Muñoa del departamento de Puno (Perú) y tiene 56 años de edad. Él tiene una relación unión libre de la cual tiene seis hijos. Actualmente, él vive en la ciudad de Urubamba y donde realiza sus actividades. Él es agricultor y albañil y desde hace varios años que se dedica a este oficio.  Niceforo requiere el crédito para comprar más semillas y abono.

El Banco Comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Urubamba (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Niceforo was born in Muñoa in the department of Puno (Peru). He is 56 years old. He is in a common law marriage from which he has 6 children. Currently, he lives and works in the town of Urubamba. He has been a farmer and bricklayer for many years. Niceforo needs the loan to buy more seeds and fertilizer.

The communal bank “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” meets every 30 days in the town of Urubamba (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known as a popular tourist area and commercial centre. It is also known for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi and for being located near one of the seven wonders of the world "Machupicchu".

loans.use: to buy seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Rosmery Mirtha

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rosmery Mirtha; ella tiene 26 años de edad y es casada; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de compra y venta de maiz,ella lleva a lugares como Paucartambo,ella vende en forma ambulatoria, la socia trabaja desde las 6:00 a.m hasta las 6:00 p.m, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de maíz. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar maíz al por mayor.
                                                                                                                 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Communal Bank "Virgen Natividad" ("Virgin of the Nativity").  This bank is located in the district of Urubamba, which is in the Province of Urubamba and the Department of Cusco.

The member is Señora Rosmery Mirtha; she is 26 years old and married.  The member combines her daily activities with a business buying and selling corn. She obtains it from places like Paucartambo, and she sells it as a street vendor.  The member works from 6 a.m. through 6 p.m..  The member wants to grow and improve her business selling corn.  The member is requesting the loan to buy corn at wholesale.

The member is happy about the loan, and promises to comply with her repayments.

loans.use: to buy corn at wholesale

loans.name: Arnaldo

texts.es:
El Señor Arnaldo tiene 23 años, es soltero tiene un negocio de Joyería hace más de tres años, comenta que paso muchas dificultades para abrir su negocio ya que siempre le gusto esta profesión y tuvo que trabajar muy duro en la agricultura con sus padres para abrir su propio local, tiene buena clientela porque hace bien su trabajo y tiene garantía, además de eso tiene muy buena presencia y carisma a la hora de vender.
Su mayor sueño es agrandar su negocio y tener un local propio ya que ahora esta alquilando. El se define como una persona luchadora, trabajadora y por sobre todo muy emprendedora. Comenta que todo lo que hace es por tener un mejor porvenir y además de eso poder ayudar a su familia por medio de su trabajo, ya que ellos siempre han estado con el cuando lo necesitó.
Solicita el crédito para la compra de oro, que le servirá como materia prima para la elaboración de las joyas que vende. Está muy agradecido a la Fundación Paraguaya por la oportunidad que le brinda, pues ve en el crédito una gran ayuda.
texts.en:
Arnaldo is 23 and single. He has had a jewelry business for more than three years. He notes that he endured many difficulties in order to open his business and that he had always liked this profession. He had to work very hard in agriculture with his parents in order to open his business. He has a good clientele because he does his work well and offers it under warranty. In addition, he makes a good impression and is charismatic at the time of sale.

His greatest dream is to expand his business and to have his own place, since he is currently renting. He defines himself as a fighter, hardworking and above all as very enterprising. He notes that everything he does is aimed at having a better future and in addition at being able to help his family through his work, since they have always been there for him when he needed them.

He is requesting this loan to buy gold which is the basic material used in making  the jewelry he sells. He is very grateful to Fundación Paraguaya for the opportunity it is providing him, since a loan will be a great help.

loans.use: to buy gold, the basic material used for making jewelry.

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es: José Antonio de 44 años es casado y tiene 3 hijos, el cuenta con un pequeño taller de soldadura en su domicilio  desde hace 18 años siendo este negocio la única fuente de ingresos para el y su familia los trabajos mas comunes que el realiza son elaboración de protecciones, puertas metálicas, canceles y todo tipo de trabajo de herrería que le soliciten sus clientes. Antonio requiere el apoyo para compra de materiales para la elaboración de protecciones y puertas para las casas de interés social y salir a venderlas casa por casa.
texts.en:
José Antonio is 44 years old and married with three children.  He has had a small soldering workshop in his home for the last 18 years.  This business is his only source of income for him and his family.

The most common jobs he takes on are making protective barriers, metal gates, folding screens and all types of iron work that his customers request.

Antonio is requesting support for buying materials for making barriers and gates for the publicly subsidized housing, and which he will sell door to door.

loans.use: to buy raw materials.

loans.name: Sonia Margot

texts.es:
Sonia nació en la ciudad del Cusco (Perú) y tiene 28 años de edad. Ella tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad de Urubamba y donde realiza sus actividades. Ella se dedica a la venta de golosinas, gaseosas en su propio kiosco. Ya son seis años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. El crédito que requiere Sonia es para comprar mercadería como por ejemplo galletas, gaseosa, pasteles, chicles, caramelos y otras cosas más. 

El Banco Comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Urubamba (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Sonia, 28, was born in the Peruvian city of Cusco.  She and her partner have two children.  She now lives in the city of Urubamba where she operates her kiosk business.  She sells snacks, soft drinks, etc.  She has operated the business for six years and says that she is happy with her progress.  She will use this loan to buy merchandise for resale: crackers, soft drinks, pastries, gum, candy and other general merchandise.

The Senor de los Milagros de Urubamba community bank meets every thirty days in the city of Urubamba (Peru).  The region is famous for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and for Machu Piccu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her retail business.

loans.name: Terimbere Munyarwandakazi A Group

texts.fr:
Jacqueline fait partie du groupe Terimbere Munyarwandakazi A. Elle est née au Rwanda et a 34 ans. Elle est mariée et elle a 3 enfants de 7 à 13 ans, dont 3 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 3ans de secondaire. 

Jacqueline est agricultrice. C’est son deuxième  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit pour acheter 20 kgs de mais  de terre, 150kgs des fertilisants(NPK), et payer la main d’œuvre. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d‘augmenter les  champs. Dans les prochaines années, Jacqueline voudrait devenir une grande agricultrice dans son secteur, bâtir une nouvelle maison  pour sa famille et payer les frais d’études universitaire pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Jacqueline is a member of group Terimbere Munyarwandakazi A. She was born in Rwanda and is 34 years old. She is married and has three kids between the ages of seven and thirteen; all three go to school. She went to school up to the third-year level in secondary school.

Jacqueline is a farmer. This is her second loan cycle with ACB. She will use her loan to purchase 20 kilos of corn seeds, 150 kilos of fertilizer (NPK) and to pay the workforce.

Her strategy for the growth of her business is to increase field size. In the coming years, Jacqueline would like to become a great farmer in her area, to build a new house for her family and to pay for her children’s college expenses.

loans.use: to buy 20 kilos of corn seeds, 150 kilos of fertilizer and to pay the workforce.

loans.name: Purificacion

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Purificacion; ella tiene 54 años de edad y es casada y tiene 7 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras y también se dedica al negocio de agricultura, ella siembra maíz y luego vende las verduras como tomates, cebollas, zapallos entre otras verduras y también vende maíz en forma ambulatoria, la socia trabaja desde las 8:00 a.m hasta las 7:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras como zapallos, tomates, zanahorias y comprar semillas para las tierras de cultivo.

 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota
texts.en:
Sra. Purificacion, 54, is a member of the VIRGEN NATIVIDAD community bank in Urubamba, a district in the "departamento" of Cusco.  

Sra. Purificacion is married and has 7 children.  She spends part of her workday tending her farm and the rest working as a street vendor, operating a vegetable-sales business.  She sells tomatoes, onions, pumpkins and other vegetables, along with maize.  She grows maize on her farm, as well.  She works from 8:00am to 7:00pm.  The businesses have been her means of supporting her children.  Sra. Purificacion is applying for a loan, part of which she will use to buy pumpkins, tomatoes and carrots for her vegetable-sales business and the rest to buy seeds for her farming business.  

She is grateful for the loan and committed to repaying it in the agreed-upon time.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her retail business and seeds for her farming business.

loans.name: Palermo

texts.es:
Palermo nació en la ciudad del Ollantaytambo de la provincia del Urubamba (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 30 años de edad. El tiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene dos hijos. Actualmente, él vive en la ciudad de Urubamba y donde realiza sus actividades. El y su familia se dedican a la agricultura ósea siembran papa, zapallo y maíz. El también en sus horas libres trabaja para una agencia de viajes como chofer. Ya son varios  años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. El crédito que requiere Palermo es para comprar abono y semillas. 

El Banco Comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Urubamba (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Palermo, 30, was born in the city of Ollantaytambo in the Peruvian "departamento" of Cusco.  He and his partner have two children.  He's now living in the city of Urubamba where he operates his farming business.  He and his family grow potatoes, pumpkins and maize.  When he's not tending his farm, he works as a driver for a taxi business.  He has operated the farm for several years now and is happy with his progress.  Palermo will use this loan to buy seeds and manure for his farming business.  

The Senor de los Milagros de Urubamba community bank meets every thirty days in the city of Urubamba (Peru).  The region around Cusco is famous for its traditional Inti Raymi festival and for Machu Piccu, one of the seven wonders of the world.

loans.use: to buy seeds and manure for his farming business.

loans.name: Rayda

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”; El banco está ubicado en el distrito de Urubamba, perteneciente a la provincia de Urubamba,  y departamento de Cusco.

La socia es la Sra. Rayda; ella tiene 25 años de edad y es casada y tiene 2 hijos; La socia alterna sus actividades diarias con el negocio de venta de verduras, ella vende zapallos, tomates, zanahorias entre otras verduras, la socia vende en el mercado de Urubamba desde las 7:00 a.m hasta las 8:00 p.m, por medio de este negocio la socia saca adelante a sus hijos, la socia quiere ampliar y mejorar el negocio de venta de verduras. La socia solicita el préstamo para comprar verduras como zapallos, tomates, zanahorias y pepinos al por mayor.
 
 La socia está feliz por el préstamo y se compromete a cumplir con los pagos de su cuota.
texts.en:
Mrs Rayda is a member of the communal bank “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD”. The bank is located in the district of Urubamba, in the province of Urubamba and department of Cusco.

Mrs Rayda is 25 years old. She is married and has 2 children. She alternates daily household duties with the business of selling vergetables. She sells squash, tomatoes, carrots and other vegetables. The member sells vegetables in the Urubamba market from 7:00 am until 8:00 pm. By virtue of this business, she is able to give her children a good start in life. The member wants to expand and improve her vegetable-selling business. The member is asking for the loan to buy vegetables such as squash, tomatoes, carrots and cucumbers in bulk.

The member is happy for the loan and agrees to comply with the repayments.

loans.use: to buy vegetables such as squash, tomatoes, carrots and cucumbers in bulk

loans.name: Ruth Mery

texts.es:
Ruth Mery nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba de la provincia de La Convención  (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 27 años de edad. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad de Urubamba junto con sus dos hijos y donde realiza sus actividades. Ella trabaja en la municipalidad de Urubamba en el área de obras. Ella también tiene un pequeño restaurante. Ya son varios años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. El crédito que requiere Ruth Mery es para comprar insumos como por ejemplo bolsas de arroz y bolsas de azúcar. 

El Banco Comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad del Urubamba (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Ruth Mery was born in the city of Quillabamba in the province of La Convención in Cusco, Peru. She is 27 years old and currently lives in the city of  Urubamba with her two children. She works in construction in the municipality of Urubamba, and she also runs a small restaurant. Ruth Mery has been running this business for a number of years and it is going very well for her. She will use this loan to purchase supplies such as bags of rice and sugar. 

The community bank “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” (Lord of Miracles of Urubamba) meets every month in the city of Urubamba in Cusco, Peru. Cusco is known for being a very commercial and touristy area because of its traditional festival, Inti Raymi, and because it is home to the one of the seven wonders of the world, Machu Picchu.

loans.use: to purchase supplies

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more maize and groundnuts to resell

loans.name: Gabina

texts.es:
Gabina nació en la ciudad de Quillabamba de la provincia de La Convención  (Cusco, Perú) y tiene 60 años de edad. Ella es casada y fruto de unión tiene cinco hijos. Actualmente, ella vive en la ciudad de Urubamba y donde realiza sus actividades. Ella se dedica a la venta de cerveza, leña y jora. Ya son vaR. años que se dedica a este negocio y le va muy bien. El crédito que requiere Gabina es para comprar leña.

El Banco Comunal “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” se reúne cada treinta en la ciudad de Urubamba (Cusco, Perú). Cusco es conocido por ser una zona muy turística, comercial, por su fiesta tradicional del Inti Raymi y porque se encuentra una de las siete maravillas del mundo “Machupicchu”.
texts.en:
Gabina was born in the town of Quillabamba in the province of La Convención  (Cusco, Perú). She is 60 years old. She is married and has 5 children. Currently she lives and works in the town of Urubamba. She sells beer, wood and corn. She has been in this business for several years and is doing very well. Gabina needs the loan to buy firewood.

The communal bank “Señor de los Milagros de Urubamba” meets every 30 days in the town of Urubamba (Cusco, Peru). Cusco is known as a popular tourist area and commercial centre. It is also known for its traditional festival of Inti Raymi and because it is located near one of the seven wonders of the world "Machupicchu.

loans.use: to buy firewood.

loans.name: Nancy

texts.es: Nancy de 40 años, vive en el municipio de Malambo, área metropolitana de Barranquilla y tiene 3 hijos; allí funciona su miscelánea, la cual inició hace 11 años cuando residía  en otro barrio al sur de la ciudad de Barranquilla; al mudarse a la población de Malambo, emprendió hace dos años su negocio, aprovechando que su hermana tenía un local bien acreditado en el sector y justamente fue ella, quien le recomendó vincularse a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, pues su creciente clientela le insistía en nuevos productos y su capital de trabajo se tornaba insuficiente, para responderle oportunamente. Con sus créditos surtió siempre la miscelánea  y diversificó su oferta con artículos para el hogar, como hasta la presente tiene. De sus desafíos siempre ha logrado salir adelante con el apoyo de sus hijos que son incondicionales. En su miscelánea vende a crédito y de contado, a clientes ubicados en el sector donde habita, que es muy comercial. Su credikiva es el tercer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo  Domingo, con el cual comprará artículos de papelería, para el hogar, y también accesorios para las confecciones. Esta inversión está planeada como exitosa, porque está realizándola en un momento en el cual tradicionalmente repuntas sus ventas, por motivo de la celebración del día del amor y de la amistad, que impacta en los meses de agosto y de Septiembre el volumen de estas. Nancy tiene sueños de crecimiento empresarial y por eso se esmera en lograr metas de venta  en su miscelánea , donde presenta indicadores financieros de acuerdo con el tipo de actividad y su rentabilidad sobre las ventas no es inferior a un 35% .
texts.en:
Nancy is 40 years old and lives with her three children in the municipality of Malambo, a metropolitan area of Barranquilla. She runs a general store which she began 11 years ago when she lived in another suburb in the south of Barranquilla. Two years after she set up her business, Nancy moved to Malambo, taking advantage of the fact that her sister ran a well-known store in the area. It was actually her sister who recommended that Nancy join the Mario Santo Domingo foundation, as her growing client base wanted new products and her working capital wasn't enough to meet her customer's demands.  With the loans she obtained Nancy was able to keep her store continually stocked up with a diverse range of products for the home, which is still the case today. In spite of the challenges she has faced, Nancy has always been able to get ahead with the unconditional help of her children. Nancy accepts cash and credit payments from her customers who live locally in her area, which sees a lot of business. 

This Kiva credit will be the third loan that Nancy has taken out with the Mario Santo Domingo foundation. With this loan she will buy stationery items for the home as well as clothing accessories. This investment is destined for success as it has been planned at a time when sales traditionally pick up around the Day of Love and Friendship, which is celebrated during the months of August and September.  

Nancy dreams of expanding her business, which is why she has her heart set on achieving sales goals in her general store. Based on workload and projected sales, her future profits can be estimated at no less than 35%.

loans.use: to purchase stationery items for the home as well as clothing accessories

loans.name: Erika

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Yucay, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Erika; tiene 31 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia tiene 2 hijos de 8, 5 años de edad; la socia trabaja administrando su tienda de abarrotes, la socia también vende pasto en la puerta de su tienda, ella aprovecha el espacio que tiene a la calle y almacena discretamente su pasto, la socia desea implementar su tienda de abarrotes ella comprara arroz, azúcar, fideos, harinas, leche para implementar sus tienda ya que estos productos mencionados son los que salen a  diario. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de mercadería de primera necesidad como azúcar, arroz, harinas, fideos, leche.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Erika belongs to the Virgen Natividad Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Yucay district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.

Erika is 31 years old and single.  She has two children, ages eight and five.  She works managing her grocery store.  She also sells fodder at the entrance to her store.  She takes advantage of the space she has to the street, and she discreetly stores her fodder.

She wishes to stock her grocery store.  She will buy rice, sugar, noodles, flour, and milk.  These products are those that sell daily.  She is requesting the loan to buy basic needs merchandise like sugar, rice, flour, noodles, and milk.

She is grateful for the support that will be given to her, and she pledges to make her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy basic needs merchandise like sugar, rice, flour, noodles, and milk.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Yucay, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Yolanda; tiene 40 años de edad,  la socia es casada; la socia tiene 3 hijos de 8, 9,1 años de edad; la socia es comerciante minorista; la socia tiene sus terrenos de cultivo de maíz blanco, la socia desea invertir en la compra de semillas para sembrar maíz blanco para esta época, la socia también preparara el terreno, la socia también invertirá en la compra de abono, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para la siembra de maíz blanco y pagara la tractor para remover la tierra y prepararla para la siembra y comprar abono.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
Yolanda belongs to the Virgen Natividad Communal Bank.  The bank is located in the Yucay district, Urubamba province, Cusco department.  Yolanda is 40 years old and married.  She has three children, ages 8, 9, and 1.

She is a retailer.  She has fields where she grows white corn.  She wishes to buy seeds to plant white corn for this season.  She prepares the land, and she will also buy fertilizer.  She is requesting the loan to buy seeds to plant white corn and to buy fertilizer.  She will also use the loan to pay for the tractor to turn over the land and prepare it for planting.


She is grateful for the support that will be given to her, and she pledges to make her payments in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to buy seeds to plant white corn and to buy fertilizer.  She will also use the loan to pay for the tractor to turn over the land and prepare it for planting.

loans.name: Gabriela

texts.es: Doña GabrieL. tiene 36 años, es casada y tiene 3 hijos los cuales estudian, elL. es originaria D. una población rica en cultura e historia, comenta que elL. estudio nada mas L. primaria por que sus papas no tenían recursos económicos para comprarle sus útiles escolares. Gaby como es conocida se dedica a L. elaboración D. pasteles y postres que venD. en su negocio que renta en L. ciudad D. L. población, dice que tiene con esta actividad aproximadamente 8 años y que empezó con ese negocio por que decía su esposo que le salían deliciosos los postres y por eso elL. decidió emprender el negocio y así también poder ayudarle a su esposo con los gastos del hogar. ElL. esta pidiendo un préstamo a L. financiera para L. compra D. ingredientes como harina, huevo, azúcar, chantilly, mantequilL. etc. doña Gaby esta muy contenta por el préstamo que le harán ya que podrá comprar un poco mas D. sus ingredientes y así poder mas e ir a otros lugares a ofrecer sus postres tan deliciosos que hace. L. meta que tiene doña GabrieL. es darles una buena educación a sus hijos y mas adelante hacer otra sucursal D. su pastelería en otra localidad.
texts.en:
GabrielL., age 30, is married and has three children who attend school.  She is from a city that is rich in culture and history.  She says that she only went to elementary school because her parents did not have the financial resources to buy her school supplies.

Gaby, as she is known, makes cakes and desserts.  She sells them at her place of business that she rents in the city.  She says that she has had this business activity for approximately eight years.  She started in this business because her husband said that her desserts were delicious.  That is why she decided to undertake the business.  This way she is also able to help her husband with the household expenses.

She is requesting a loan to buy ingredients like flour, eggs, sugar, whipped cream, and butter, etc.  Gaby is very happy about the loan she will receive because she will be able to buy a few more ingredients.  That way she will be able make more and go to other places to sell the very delicious desserts that she makes.

GabrieL.’s goal is to give her children a good education.  Another goal is to later on open a branch of her pastry shop in another location.

loans.use: to buy ingredients like flour, eggs, sugar, whipped cream, and butter, etc.

loans.name: Carmen Rosa

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito D. Yucay, en la Provincia D. Urubamba y Departamento D. Cusco.

La  socia Carmen; tiene 56 años D. edad,  la socia es casada; la socia tiene 6 hijos D. 21, 20, 23, 14 años D. edad; y otros dos hijos D. la socia que son independientes; la socia trabaja como comerciante minorista, en las épocas D. febrero, marzo, abril la socia se dedica  a la venta D. choclo, también lleva a Arequipa, Juliaca, la socia en esta época se dedica  al compra y venta D. verduras, ella venD. zapallo, cebollas, tomate y otros; La socia también tiene su terreno y ahora ella desea invertir en la compra D. semillas para sembrar maíz blanco para cosechar choclos, la socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra D. semillas D. maíz para la nueva época D. siembra.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir D. manera disciplinada con los pagos D. las cuotas.
texts.en:
This member belongs to the Communal Bank "Virgen Natividad".  The banks is located in the district of Yucay, in the Province of Urubamba and the Department of Cusco.

The member is Carmen, she is 56 years old.  The member is married, and has six children, four of whom are aged 21, 20, 23, and 14 years old.  The member's other two children are financially independent.  

The member works in sales.  During February, March and April, the member sells corn, which she also takes to Arequipa and Juliaca.  In this current time of year, the member buys and sells vegetables.  She sells pumpkins, onions, tomatoes and other things.  

The member also has a field, and now she wants to invest in purchasing seeds to plant white corn plants so as to harvest corn.  The member is asking for the loan to invest in the purchase of corn seeds for the new planting season.

loans.use: to invest in buying corn seed for the new planting season.

loans.name: Dukundumurimo Group

texts.fr:
Lydia fait partie du groupe Dukundumurimo. Elle est née au Rwanda et a 46 ans. Elle est mariée et elle a 5 enfants de 7 à 22 ans, dont 5 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est 8 ans de primaire. 

Lydia est agricultrice. C’est son premier cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit pour acheter 200 kgs de pommes de terre, 50 kg de fertilisants et payer la main d’œuvre. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est d‘augmenter la capacité en achetant d’autre champs. Dans les prochaines années, Lydia voudrait devenir une grande agricultrice dans son secteur et bâtir une autre maison pour sa famille et continuer à payer les frais d’études pour ses enfants.
texts.en:
Lydia is part of the group Dukundumurimo. She was born in Rwanda and is 46 years old. She is married and has five children, from 7 to 22 years old. The five children are in school. She has an 8th grade education. 

Lydia is a farmer. This loan cycle is her first one with ACB. She is going to use her loan to buy 200 kg of potatoes and 50 kg of fertilizers and to cover the cost of labor. 

Her strategy for business growth is to increase her capacity by buying more fields. In the next few years, Lydia would like to become a major farmer in her sector and to build another house for her family, as well as to continue covering her children's schooling costs.

loans.use: to buy 200 kg of potatoes and 50kg of fertilizers and to cover the cost of labor

loans.name: Jose Luis

texts.es:
El socio pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Yucay, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

El socio Jose Luis; tiene 20 años de edad,  el socio es soltero; el socio es agricultor, el socio se dedica  al cuidado, sembrío y cosecha de su terreno, el socio ahora desea invertir el crédito en la compra de semillas de maíz blanco para poder sembrar, también quiere remover su terreno para preparar para la nueva siembra y abonar. El socio solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para sembrar maíz blanco de primera y exportarlo.

El socio agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD” communal bank, located in the Yucay district, in the province of Urubamba and the department of Cusco.

The member is Jose Luis. He is 20 and single. He is a farmer and cares for, seeds and harvests his land. He now wants to invest this loan in the purchase of corn seeds in order to be able to sow. He also wants to till his land to prepare it for the new planting, and to fertilize. He is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of seeds for sowing white corn and then exporting it.

He is grateful for the help that we are offering him and promises to repay his quotas in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of seeds for sowing white corn and then exporting it.

loans.name: San Isidro Group

texts.es:
El comité San Isidro se formó gracias a que una D. las miembros se acercó a la oficina D. Fundación Paraguaya a interiorizarse del programa D. mujeres emprendedoras, luego D. esto comentó a sus amigas y vecinas y D. allí surge dicho grupo. Todas ellas son mujeres muy sacrificadas y luchadoras, que buscan, por medio D. su trabajo en pan diario para sus familias.
Un Ejemplo D. lucha es la señora Emiliana, ella se dedica a la cría y posterior venta D. animales; ella por medio D. este trabajo logra generar los ingresos necesarios para poder mantener a su familia. Comenta que este es un trabajo muy sacrificado, pues tiene que alimentar y cuidar a los animales y velar por que no tengan ninguna enfermedad. Uno D. sus sueños es poder tener una granja donD. pueda criar todo tipo D. animales.
Ella solicita el crédito para al compra D. animales, como así también alimento para los mismos. Agradece a la Fundación por la oportunidad que esta le da, pues D. obtener el crédito le será D. gran ayuda.
texts.en:
The San Isidro Communal Bank was formed thanks to one of the members approaching the office of the Fundación Paraguaya [Paraguay Foundation] to familiarize herself with the entrepreneurial women’s program. Later she told her friends and neighbors about it and this group came about from there. All of the women are self-sacrificing and fighters who seek their family’s daily bread through their work. 

One example is the fight of Emiliana. She breeds and sells animals. It is through this work that she earns the necessary income to proviD. for her family. She says this work causes her to make many sacrifices, as she has to feed and care for the animals and watch over them so they remain disease free. One of her dreams is to be able to have a farm where she can raise all types of animals.

She is asking for a loan in order to buy animals, as well as feed for them. She thanks the Foundation for the opportunity it gives her because getting the loan will be a big help.

loans.use: to purchase animals and animal feed for them.

loans.name: Edhit Yobana

texts.es: La Sra. Edhit es madre soltera, tiene 02 hijos, la señora se dedica a la venta de abarrotes (azúcar, arroz, leche, aceite, etc.)  ya que cuenta con su propia tienda ubicada en su vivienda, ella es muy trabajadora y desea salir adelante es por eso que también realiza la crianza de animales para luego venderlos y así tener una entrada más en su economía; el crédito otorgado lo va a invertir en la compra de mercadería para tener más variedad en su negocio.  Su sueño de la Sra. Edhit es tener una gran tienda y lograr una mejor calidad de vida para sus hijos. Ella está muy agradecida por el crédito otorgado.
texts.en:
Edhit is a single mother with two children. She sells groceries such as sugar, rice, milk, cooking oil etc., from her own store, located in her home.  

She is very hard-working, and wishes to move forward in her life. That's why she also raises livestock for sale, so as to have one more source of income. 

She is going to use the loan to buy merchandise, in order to have a greater variety of products in her business.

Edhit's dream is to have a big store and to achieve a better quality of life for her children. She is very thankful that her loan has been granted.

loans.use: To buy merchandise, in order to have a greater variety of products in her business.

loans.name: Edison

texts.en:
Edison, only 33 years of age, is married and has 4 children. He lives in Kyenjojo district in western Uganda. Edison runs a pharmacy which he established 2 years ago. He generates about 30,000 UGX of weekly profit from this business. 

Edison is a hardworking man who also practices agriculture to gain additional income. Edison plans to use this Kiva loan to buy more drugs to resell at his pharmacy.

loans.use: To buy more drugs to resell.

loans.name: Lizeth

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Yucay, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Lizeth; tiene 26 años de edad,  la socia es soltera; la socia trabaja con su familia, ala socia se dedica  a la agricultura, ella y su familia producen maíz blanco de primera , este es un grano grande y rico en sabor, este maíz es cotizado y por ello ellos se dedican a la exportación de este tipo de maíz de primera calidad; la socia junto a sus familia invierten todo su tiempo en mejorar su producción, la socia desea el crédito para invertir en uno de los terrenos de la familia y en la compra de semillas para la nueva época de siembra, para lo cual requiere arar la tierra y prepararla para la nueva siembra después de esto abonar el terreno. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de maíz de primera en semillas para la nueva siembra, abono y preparar la tierra.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD” communal bank. The bank is located in the Yucay district, in the province of Urubamba, Cusco department.

The member is Lizeth. She is 26 and single. She works with her family in agriculture. They produce high quality white corn. White corn is a large grain, rich in flavour, which is highly sought-after. For this reason, they export this highest quality variety of corn. Lizeth and her family invest all of their time in improving their production. She wants this loan to invest in one of her family's plots of land, and in the purchase of seeds for the new sowing season. She needs to plough her land and prepare it for the new crop, and then fertilize the land. She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of high quality corn seeds for the new sowing season, as well as fertilizer, and for preparing the land.

She is grateful for the support that we are offering and promises to repay her quotas in a disciplined manner.

loans.use: to invest in the purchase of high quality corn seed for the new sowing season; to purchase fertilizer; and to prepare the land.

loans.name: Senovia

texts.es: Doña Senovia de 42 años de edad es soltera, trabaja como docente desde hace 20 años, está solicitando su 9no crèdito para construir  una habitaciòn y de esta manera tener mejores condiciones en su hogar,  cuenta con el apoyo de su compañero de vida quien se dedica a trabajar en una pequeña finca familiar aportando con los gastos del hogar. Es muy querida en su comunidad por demostrar siempre mucha dedicaciòn y responsabilidad en su trabajo y compromisos adquiridos. Su mayor sueño en la vida es que su linda familia goze de buena salud y tener estabilidad laboral para continuar mejorando las condiciones de vida de su familia que es por quien trabaja tanto.
texts.en: Mrs. Senovia, age 42, is single and has worked as a teacher for 20 years. She is requesting her ninth loan to build a room and thus have better conditions in her home. She counts on the support of her partner, who works on a small family farm to help with the household costs. Senovia is very beloved in her community because she always demonstrates great dedication and responsibility in her work and her commitments. Her greatest dream in life is for her beautiful family to have good health and stability in their jobs in order to continue improving their familial quality of life, for which they work very hard.

loans.use: to build a room.

loans.name: Mercy Bernardina

texts.es:
La señora Mercy es socia del banco comunal Mujeres Hacia Adelante del Distrito San Fernando del Departamento de Ucayali. Tiene 35 años, està casada y tiene una niña pequeña. 
Lleva nueve años trabajando con los préstamos de Manuela Ramos, se dedica a la venta de productos de belleza de la marqua Unique lo que complementa el tiempo que està con su hija y su madre que vive en la misma casa, de esa manera apoya a su esposo que es comerciante independiente.  
Para tener màs ganancia quiere invertir el nuevo préstamo de S/ 1,200.00 en productos para ampliar su catàlogo: 2 brillos labiales, 1 crema para ojos, 2 lápiz delineadores  para  ojos, 1 delineador liquido, 1 rubor, 2 perfumes, 1 champú, 1 enjuague, 1 bloqueador  solar.
Cuenta con el apoyo de su madre que se queda con la niña mientras Mercy sale a trabajar y està muy contenta que Manuela Ramos le otorga un crédito cada ciclo para poder seguir trabajando.
texts.en:
Mrs. Mercy is a member of the Mujeres Hacia Adelante Communal Bank, in the San Fernando district of the Ucayali department. She is 35, married, and has a small daughter.
She has been working with loans from Manuela Ramos for nine years. She sells Unique brand beauty products. This is a good job for spending time with her mother and her daughter, who live with her. This is how she supports her husband who is an independent merchant.
In order to make more of an income, she wants to invest her new loan of S/ 1,200 in products to expand her catalogue: 2 lip glosses, 1 eye cream, 2 eye liners, 1 liquid liner, 1 blush, 2 perfumes, 1 shampoo, 1 conditioner, 1 sunscreen.
Her mother supports her, taking care of Mercy's daughter while Mercy goes out to work. She is very happy that Manuela Ramos has given her a loan every cycle so that she can continue working.

loans.use: to purchase cosmetics.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es:
La  socia pertenece al banco comunal “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD” el banco se encuentra ubicado en el Distrito de Yucay, en la Provincia de Urubamba y Departamento de Cusco.

La  socia Lourdes; tiene 30 años de edad,  la socia es conviviente; la socia tiene 2 hijos de 6, 2  años y medio de edad; la socia trabaja administrando y atendiendo su tienda de abarrotes y también ella tiene su terreno de cultivo de maíz, la socia cuando cosecha choclo lo vende , ella desea  invertir el crédito en la siembra de maíz blanco para cosechar en el mes de octubre y disfrutar del riquísimo choclo del valle sagrado y la otra parte venderlo,. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de semillas para la siembra de maíz y la venta final de choclo.

La  socia agradece el apoyo que se le otorgara y así mismo se compromete a cumplir de manera disciplinada con los pagos de las cuotas.
texts.en:
The member belongs to the “VIRGEN NATIVIDAD” Communal Bank. The bank is located in the Yucay district, in the Urubamba province, department of Cusco.

Lourdes is 30 and lives with her partner. They have 2 children ages 6 and 2 1/2. She runs her grocery store and also has a plot of land where she cultivates corn. When she harvests it she sells it. She wants to invest this loan in sowing white corn to be harvested in October. She will be able to enjoy the rich corn of Valle Sagrado, and sell it as well. She is requesting this loan to invest in the purchase of seeds for sowing and later selling corn.
